Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Penn in 1978...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1979, off Robert Poli (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1979, off Samuel Poitra (Ash)...
Injured on 5/29/1984 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Had 6 hits with 1 RBI against Gashouse on 7/20/1985...
Drove in 6 runs against Diablo on 8/25/1986...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Wisconsin on 8/24/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/9/1989 to a 4-year deal worth $4,999,500 per year...
Won World Championship with Troy in 1989...
